EmailTemplate.name: Notify Applicant of Parking Application
EmailTemplate.subject: Parking Permit Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for submitting your {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Licence_Type__c} {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Licence_Record_Type__c} application.
If you need to contact us about this application please quote ref : {!arcusregserv__RS_Activity__c.arcusregserv__Licence__r.Name}
Yours Sincerely, Parking Team Peterborough City Council
